com.cipherlibrary

Class AffineEncryptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cipherlibrary.Encryptor
      • com.cipherlibrary.AffineEncryptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encryptable

    public class AffineEncryptor
extends Encryptor
    Represents a machine, which can encrypt or decrypt text, using affine cipher (each letter is enciphered with the function (ax + b) mod 26)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.cipherlibrary.Encryptor

    • Constructor Detail

      • AffineEncryptor

        public AffineEncryptor(int a,
                       int b,
                       CipherMode mode)
        Creates a new AffineEncryptor with the given perimeters.
        Parameters:
        a - the coefficient of x, a must be chosen such that a and 26 are coprime.
        b - the magnitude of the shift.
        mode - can be chosen from LETTERS_ONLY, PUNCTUATION_MARKS and SPACES.

    • Method Detail

      • getB

        public int getB()
        Retrieves coefficient b
        Returns:

      • getA

        public int getA()
        Retrieves coefficient a
        Returns:
        current coefficient a

      • setA

        public void setA(int a)
        Sets coefficient a
        Parameters:
        a - to set. Coefficient a must be chosen such that a and 26 are coprime, otherwise a will be set to 1.
